reviewText: I got this vid from my library, and tried it for the first time today.  Wow!  What an great workout!  I'm sorry it doesn't seem to be in production any longer, because it is one of the most fun videos I have ever done.  I didn't understand a lot of what was being said, because it's in Spanish, and some of the moves are tricky to get at first, but that's ok.  If I could do it all the first time, it wouldn't be challenging.  The music is great, and the moves are fun.  The time just flew by!
